post_text: January 6, 2019 at 5:38 PM#1Hello,I have create a macro that jumps directly to a very specific cue of a sequence:CodeGoto Cue 4 Fader 1Now I would like to improve it by replacing "Fader 1" by the reference of the fader to witch the macro is assigned. Something likeCodeGoto Cue 4 $currentmacrofaderThis would allow me to put the macro below any fader. Right now if I move my sequence to a different fader, I have to edit the macro which is enoying.I hope that make sense, would there be a way to acheive this?Thank you,

posts.post_text: January 7, 2019 at 8:24 AM#2You could use names instead of numbers.Something likeCodeGoto Executor *."Exactnameoftheexecutor" Cue xshould do the job.
